Articles.Content:
I've been playing 0.90.0 beta for a while now and it's crashed every so often but nothing major, mainly memory issues. I have an unmodded install of the game and I loaded it up, opened a sandbox save and started to play about with the Mk3 parts but for me, the textures for all Mk3 Cargo Bays are missing. They are plain white. D: Is anyone else experiencing it and does anyone know how to get the textures back.

Many thanks!

Edited December 20, 2014 by KcEdwards
Spell checking etc
The textures are there but the .tga loader is bugged, if you have an art program you can try loading them and resaving them with the same name.

While this is the longest of long shots, recently we had a user who apparently managed to get the textures to load properly by disabling the Terrain Scatter settings. As I said before, it's a long shot, but it is nonetheless worth attempting just in case.
I just ran the patcher again. It didn't transfer any files, but suddenly the textures were in place. No settings were changed.
This happens to me, but I do not mind. My cargo bays go all white. It is on and off. Also my Habitat pack does it too but that's fine, just a bug.
